ForecastingUserPreference.name: ForecastingUserPreference
ForecastingUserPreference.description: Represents the forecasting selections that a user has made, such as display options, date range, forecasting type, and currency.

ExternalId.description: A unique system-generated numerical identifier for the user.

ForecastingDisplayedTypeId.description: An identifier for the forecasting type that’s displayed.

ForecastingPeriodDuration.description: How long the forecasting period lasts.

ForecastingPeriodType.description: The forecasting period’s type. Valid values include: Month, Quarter, Week, or Year

ForecastingStartPeriod.description: The date when the forecasting period begins.

ForecastingViewCurrency.description: The currency shown on the forecasts page.

IsForecastingHideZeroRows.description: Whether the forecasts page shows zero-value rows.

IsForecastingShowQuantity.description: Whether the forecasts page shows forecast quantity.

IsHideForecastingGuidedTour.description: Whether the forecasts page shows the guided tour.

IsHideForecastingQuotaColumn.description: Whether the forecasts page shows a quota column.

IsShowForecastingChangeSignals.description: Whether the forecasts page shows changes in the last 7 days.

IsShowForecastingQuotaAttainment.description: Whether the forecasts page shows quota attainment information.

ForecastingUserPreference.accessRules: As of Spring ’20 and later, only standard users with the View All Forecasts or Allow Forecasting permission or delegated forecast manager status can access this object.
